content:
The chunk appears within a debugging function `checkLeak()` that tests for reference counting and memory management issues in a task manager implementation. The code verifies whether releasing a task (`t = None`) correctly adjusts the reference count of an object, ensuring no memory leaks occur when tasks are removed or released.

print('task.getRefCount(): %s' % t.getRefCount())
        print('** task release')
        t = None
        print('sys.getrefcount(obj): %s' % sys.getrefcount(obj))
        assert sys.getrefcount(obj) == startRefCount
